p: In the present study, EOs of C. zeylanicum, C. longa, O. basilicum, Z. officinale, and C. martini were obtained by hydrodistillation and GCâ€“MS analysis was chosen to deduce their chemical profile. The antioxidant action of EOs was measured by radical scavenging assays. Antifungal activity of EOs on selected fungi A. ochraceus and P. verrucosum was tested by micro-well dilution technique. Finally, inhibitory activity of EOs on the growth and OTA content of A. ochraceus and P. verrucosum was established in maize grains.
